quotes.message: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: Discipline imposed from the outside eventually defeats when it is not matched by desire from within.

quotes.message: My father liked me, when I wasna being an idiot. And he loved me, too -- enough to beat the daylights out of me when I was being an idiot.
quotes.name: Diana Gabaldon

quotes.message: Discipline is the difference between what you want now and what you want most.

quotes.message: If we don't discipline ourselves, the world will do it for us.
quotes.name: William Feather

quotes.message: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak and esteem to all.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: You can never conquer the mountain. You can only conquer yourself.

quotes.message: Discipline must come through liberty. . . . We do not consider an individual disciplined only when he has been rendered as artificially silent as a mute and as immovable as a paralytic. He is an individual annihilated, not disciplined.

quotes.message: Without discipline, there's no life at all.

quotes.message: Discipline and concentration are a matter of being interested.

quotes.message: Discipline in art is a fundamental struggle to understand oneself, as much as to understand what one is drawing.
quotes.name: Henry Moore

quotes.message: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people.

quotes.message: No man is fit to command another that cannot command himself.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: One discipline always leads to another discipline.

quotes.message: Some people regard discipline as a chore. For me, it is a kind of order that sets me free to fly.

quotes.message: If you will discipline yourself to make your mind self-sufficient you will thereby be least vulnerable to injury from the outside.
quotes.name: Critias Of Athens

quotes.message: No man is such a conqueror, as the one that has defeated himself.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Loving discipline encourages a child to respect other people and live as a responsible, constructive citizen.

quotes.message: Self-command is the main discipline.

quotes.message: Self discipline is when your conscience tells you to do something and you don't talk back.

quotes.message: Discipline yourself to do the things you need to do when you need to do them, and the day will come when you will be able to do the things you want to do when you want to do them!

quotes.message: Discipline and commitment is pathway to reach goals and dreams.

quotes.message: Discipline is not a virtue, but the solicitor of virtuous character.

quotes.message: The discipline that is needed in our lives is the discipline that comes from within.

quotes.message: Discipline trains you to put up with disappointments, every rose has a thorn.
quotes.name: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.message: Discipline is just choosing between what you want now and what you want most.

quotes.message: Discipline is doing what needs to be done even though you don't want to.

quotes.message: Discipline is the foundation of a successful and happy life.

quotes.message: When grandparents enter the door, discipline flies out the window.

quotes.message: Without discipline the Army would just be a bunch of guys wearing the same color clothing.

quotes.message: Discipline doesn't break a child's spirit half as often as the lack of it breaks a parent's heart.

quotes.message: Discipline and constant work are the whetstones upon which the dull knife of talent is honed until it becomes sharp enough, hopefully, to cut through even the toughest meat and gristle.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: My left hand is my bad hand. I spank it with my right hand. You might call it clapping, but I call it discipline.

quotes.message: Discipline imposed from the outside eventually defeats when it is not matched by desire from within.
quotes.name: Dawson Earle Trotman

quotes.message: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Discipline is choosing between what you want now, and what you want most.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built. Lack of discipline inevitably leads to failure.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: One can have no smaller or greater mastery than mastery of oneself.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action, and discipline that enabled us to follow through.

quotes.message: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Discipline must be a habit so ingrained that it is stronger than the excitement of battle.
quotes.name: George S. Patton

quotes.message: The best time to set up a new discipline is when the idea is strong.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Self-mastery and self-discipline are the foundation of good relationships with others.

quotes.message: You cannot be disciplined in great things and undisciplined in small things.

quotes.message: Disciplining yourself to do what you know is right and important, although difficult, is the highroad to pride, self-esteem, and personal satisfaction.

quotes.message: The great end of education is, to discipline rather than to furnish the mind; to train it to the use of its own powers, rather than fill it with the accumulation of others.

quotes.message: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.

quotes.message: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
quotes.name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.message: Self-disciplined begins with the mastery of your thoughts. If you don't control what you think, you can't control what you do. Simply, self-discipline enables you to think first and act afterward.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: All excellence involves discipline and tenacity of purpose.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: Talent without discipline is like an octopus on roller skates.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: But the discipline you have in your life should be one determined by your own desires and your own needs, not put upon you by society or authority.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: The discipline of writing something down is the first step toward making it happen.
quotes.name: Lee Iacocca

quotes.message: If we are to have such a discipline we must have standards, and to get our standards under existing conditions we must have criticism.
quotes.name: Irving Babbitt

quotes.message: No evil propensity of the human heart is so powerful that it may not be subdued by discipline.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The secret of discipline is motivation. When a man is sufficiently motivated, discipline will take care of itself.
quotes.name: Alexander Paterson

quotes.message: I think of discipline as the continual everyday process of helping a child learn self-discipline.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: It doesn't matter what you're trying to accomplish. It's all a matter of discipline. I was determined to discover what life held for me beyond the inner-city streets.
quotes.name: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.message: The steady discipline of intimate friendship with Jesus results in men becoming like Him.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Self-discipline is the ability to make yourself do what you should do, when you should do it, whether you feel like it or not.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
quotes.name: Mike Ditka
